statements: DELETE FROM legal_documents WHERE document_name = 'Contract Agreement';
DELETE FROM legal_documents WHERE document_id = 1 AND document_name = 'Contract'
DELETE FROM contracts WHERE contract_id = 1 AND title = 'Contract 1';
DELETE FROM statutes WHERE statute_id = 10 AND jurisdiction = 'California';
DELETE FROM agreements WHERE agreement_name = 'Service Agreement';
DELETE FROM statutes WHERE jurisdiction = 'Federal' AND enactment_date < '2020-01-01';
DELETE FROM agreements WHERE party1 = 'Company A' AND effective_date > '2022-03-15';
